document.full_text: linkedin said it expects to raise 30 percent more than it had forecast in its initial public offering, in a sign of the strength of investor appetite for social networking companies.
document.title: linkedin ups ipo range, stokes social media frenzy
lines_and_colors: linkedin said it expects to raise 30 percent more than it had forecast in its initial public offering, in a sign of the strength of investor appetite for social networking companies.
